#pragma config(Sensor, S4,     ultra,          sensorEV3_Ultrasonic)
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//

task main()
{
	int value;
	while(1)
	{
		value = SensorValue(ultra);
		displayTextLine(0,"%d cm", value);
		
		if(value > 30){motor[motorB] = value - 30; motor[motorC] = value - 30;}
		else if(value == 30) {motor[motorB] = 0; motor[motorC] = 0;}		
		else{motor[motorB] = value - 30; motor[motorC] = value - 30;}
	}
	
}
